Title: Frequently asked questions

FAQs.Question: How often should I have my patio pressure washed in Southwest Houston?
FAQs.Answer: We recommend a yearly pressure washing of your patio to maintain its appearance and prevent damage from dirt and grime buildup.

FAQs.Question: Do I need to be home during the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: No, our team can perform the service even in your absence, provided we have access to the areas needing cleaning.

FAQs.Question: How long does it take to pressure wash an average-sized home in Southwest Houston?
FAQs.Answer: Typically, it takes a few hours to pressure wash an average-sized home, although this can vary based on the size and condition of your home.

FAQs.Question: Do I need to remove all outdoor items, such as furniture, before the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we advise removing or covering all outdoor items to protect them from the high-pressure water spray.

FAQs.Question: Can pressure washing damage my property's surface?
FAQs.Answer: Incorrect pressure washing can cause damage. However, our trained and experienced team uses the right techniques and pressures to clean your property safely and effectively.

FAQs.Question: What cleaning agents do you use during the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: We use a range of cleaning agents, depending on the surface and level of dirt. All our cleaning agents are safe and eco-friendly.

FAQs.Question: Are you licensed and insured to provide pressure washing services in Southwest Houston?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we are fully licensed, insured, and certified by the Better Business Bureau.

FAQs.Question: Do you provide any guarantees for your work?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we guarantee your satisfaction. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll make it right.
